sentence: Alec Poitevint, who served as campaign chairman for every statewide Perdue race in Georgia -- yes, Sonny and David -- threw his weight and fundraising clout behind Brian Kemp.
author: Erick Erickson
title: The Worst-Played Hand in Politics Today
